quote: I thought that when I spilled one secret, the rest would come tumbling after, but openness is a habit you form over time, and not a switch you flip whenever you want to, I'm finding,
quote_letters: I THOUGHT THAT WHEN I SPILLED ONE SECRET THE REST WOULD COME TUMBLING AFTER BUT OPENNESS IS A HABIT YOU FORM OVER TIME AND NOT A SWITCH YOU FLIP WHENEVER YOU WANT TO IM FINDING
